description:
Itou Kuramoto is a First-Class Investigator, and member of Hirako`s team. He is easy-going and cheerful, slowly becoming a good friend to http://anidb.net/ch92821 [Sasaki] and the Quinx. After the Auction, he finds himself suddenly given command of the squad and has misgivings about it.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Itou Kuramoto
